channel.title: Programming on pshegger's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Programming on pshegger's blog

item.title: Advent of Code 2020
item.description: A short summary about my experiences with Advent of Code 2020

item.title: Turning a Camera Feed into a Solved Sudoku
item.description: An introduction to a simple application that uses ML Kit & maths to create an augmented reality sudoku solver

item.title: RenderScript is Still alive
item.description: RenderScript is a great way to compute large amount of data, so let's discover together what it is and when should it be considered.

item.title: @GenerateForMe
item.description: Annotations are extremely versatile especially if we write our own processor to overcharge our development. Learn how to write one in Kotlin.

item.title: Help Yourself and the Compiler with Contracts
item.description: In the world of Kotlin, contracts represent a deal between the developer and the compiler. As a developer you can share insight of your code with the compiler and it can use this extra info for better code analysis.
